meanings.definition: Not moving or not able to be moved.
meanings.sent1: The heavy rock was unmoving on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The cat sat unmoving on the windowsill, watching the birds outside.
meanings.sent3: The toy car remained unmoving in the middle of the room, waiting for someone to play with it.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood unmoving in the forest, its roots firmly planted in the ground.
meanings.sent5: The statue in the park was so lifelike, it appeared unmoving to the unsuspecting passersby.

meanings.definition: Showing no signs of activity or progress.
meanings.sent1: The clock on the wall seemed unmoving, its hands stuck at midnight.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house looked unmoving, with no lights on and no one coming in or out.
meanings.sent3: The project remained unmoving on his desk, untouched for weeks.
meanings.sent4: The stagnant pond appeared unmoving, covered in a thick layer of green algae.
meanings.sent5: The city at night was eerily unmoving, with empty streets and silent buildings.
